MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.03pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:36pm on Sunday, 18 October 2020
